io.micronaut.spring.context.aware

Class SpringAwareListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.spring.context.aware.SpringAwareListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanCreatedEventListener<java.lang.Object>, BeanInitializedEventListener<java.lang.Object>, java.util.EventListener

    @Singleton
 @Internal
public class SpringAwareListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements BeanInitializedEventListener<java.lang.Object>, BeanCreatedEventListener<java.lang.Object>
    Enables support for the interfaces EnvironmentAware, ApplicationContextAware, and BeanFactoryAware.
    Author:
    graemerocher
